definition: practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸
to ill-use/to humiliate/to degrade/to ruin/also pr. [zuo2 jian4]
to waste/to spoil/to destroy/to insult grievously
to keep a promise/to honor an agreement
Actual practice is the sole criterion for judging truth (item from Deng Xiaoping theory, from 1978)
pinyin: shi2 jian4 shi4 jian3 yan4 zhen1 li3 de5 wei2 yi1 biao1 zhun3
containing_words.word: 實踐是檢驗真理的唯一標準

definition: King Gou Jian of Yue (c. 470 BC), sometimes considered one of the Five Hegemons 春秋五霸

sentences.english: You think it was the resolution of Goujian, the Yue king?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲是越王勾踐臥薪嚐膽發奮勵志？

sentences.english: The spring and Autumn period, King Wu defeated and captured goujian.
sentences.chinese: 春秋時期，吳王夫差打敗並俘虜了越王勾踐。

sentences.english: The King of Yue, Gou Jian submitted and sued for peace.
sentences.chinese: 後越王勾踐臥薪嚐膽，任用文種和范蠡重振國政。

sentences.english: But just at that time, Gou Jian, king of the State of Yue, outflanked Fu Chai and attacked him in the rear.
sentences.chinese: 可正在這個時候，越王勾踐抄了吳王的後路。

sentences.english: Guo Moruo is the modem education thought initiator and the success practice.
sentences.chinese: 郭沫若是現代教育思想的提倡者和成功的踐行者。

sentences.english: There are many interpretations of King Goujian’s story.
sentences.chinese: 越王勾踐的故事可做多種解讀。

sentences.english: His theory of intellectuals is a theory of intellectual practices.
sentences.chinese: 他知識分子理論實際上是關於知識踐的理論。

sentences.english: Have the courage to change the things you can.
sentences.chinese: 對於可以改變的事情勇於踐之。

sentences.english: President Obama says they are all agents of change.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統說他們都是“變革踐行者”。

sentences.english: Jimei Group is a practitioner of theory and practice on interior design and decoration, as well as technical training.
sentences.chinese: 精於室內設計裝修樂於技術培訓的理論與實踐踐行者。

to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
